TestDescription.name: MySQL server older than 4.0.21
TestDescription.Description: There are several flaws in the remote version of this database server: [break] 1. There is an unauthorized database GRANT privilege vulnerability, which may allow an attacker to misuse the GRANT privilege it has been given and to use it against other databases [break] 2. A denial of service vulnerability may be triggered by the misuse of the FULLTEXT search functionality.
TestDescription.Impact: Abuse of functionality: an attacker uses server's features and functionality to consume, defraud, or circumvents access controls mechanisms.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade the MySQL server tot the latest version.
